Our Philosophy: “Your Crew, Our Care”

We  like  to  be  your  ‘window’  to  the  crew  market  in  the  Philippines  and  customize  our  operations  to suit your needs. What does this mean in real life:

  • For each of our Principals we develop and maintain a dedicated pool of Seafarers
  • We strongly believe loyalty pays off in the long run in terms of lower recruitment & training costs and more experienced crew. We will assist you in staying abreast of the market and advise you how to invest in measures enhancing crew loyalty.
  • We can advise on, or execute for you a cadet program aimed at making you self sufficient in Officers in the future
  • We can assist in setting up a development program for your crew with a proper career path for each rank. We can execute and monitor your training policy or advise you on training venues and training development.
  • We will customize our services around your specific needs representing your Company towards the crew and implement your policies and standards.
  • We can advise you on prevailing market conditions and ensuring Terms & Conditions stay abreast of market developments. We can assist in negotiations with local Unions if applicable.
